name: WizWorld Demo
description:
Description:

Wizworld is an action, jump n' run inspired by Avatar,

 Teeworlds and Crash Bandicoot, which gives you the freedoom to swing

 with a grappling hook that can almost grab anything, while casting powerfull spells

 based on the four elements.

 Fight monsters in arena style levels, swing for your live in chase levels

 or fight with or against your friends in local multiplayer with up to 4 players!

Demo 0.0.4

WizWorld 0.0.4 is the first public release for the game I am currently working on.

This action jump n run focuses on quick action and freedom of movement.

Controls:

TAB - Pause Menu

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse Leftclick - Shoot

Mouse Rightclick - Grappling hook

Shift- Special Skill

Q/E or Mousewheel - Change elements

This game has controller support up to 8 local players, so feel free to join in with some friends.

For frequent updates and the desktop version please visit the official patreon page.

Please leave positive / negative feedback!
